content: in a civil case heard by the vilnius city district court a final decision was made regarding the division of matrimonial property the defendant was awarded an audi 100 car as their personal property the court also recognized the applicants obligation towards a leasing company and the defendants obligations towards a credit card company which have been fulfilled various articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property were mentioned the applicant has brought a legal action to dissolve the marriage and seek the division of property acquired during the marriage there is a dispute over the division of joint property and credit obligations the court has dissolved the marriage divided the property and recognized the obligations the court has dismissed the remaining claims and ordered the defendant to pay costs the plaintiff has also been ordered to pay a sum to the state budget

metadata.cost: 37.50 EUR (legal fees) + 7.67 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
